feed.title: CaddyManager Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for CaddyManager: v0.0.1 - First public version
entry.content:
First public eyeballs!

I've been playing around with this tool for a while now - working on it in the weekends and in between work. It's far from "production ready", but it's at a point that I need more people to use it so I can gather some proper feedback, and hopefully make people's lives a bit easier :)

What's Changed

  • Well, everything of course...

What's in this release

  • Import a server
  • Import a configuration
  • Generate a configuration
  • Deploy a configuration
  • Audit logging
  • User management
  • API tools

What is NOT in this release

  • Dark mode
  • Non-power user instructions, you need to understand caddy and what it does.
  • Dashboard
  • Full accesibility features
  • Unit and E2E tests
